FuncDef: This command adds a VRRP priority control policy association with the virtual router instance.

ParaDef.Info: The policy ID of the VRRP priority control expressed as a decimal integer. The vrrp-policy-id must already exist for the command to function. Values-1 to 9999.

ExtraInfo: Default: no policy - No VRRP priority control policy is associated with the virtual router instance.
